formalpara.title: Figure 1. GABA structure
formalpara.para: (A) GABA is synthesized from glutamate by the enzyme glutamic acid decarboxylase (GAD). (B) GABA drugs. Muscimol is a GABAA agonist and baclofen is a GABAB agonist. Bicuculline and saclofen are antagonists of GABAA and GABABrespectively. Invertebrate GABAA-like receptors are insensitive to bicuculline.
